Package patreon.java.resources

Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • patreon.java.resources.shared.BaseResource
      • patreon.java.resources.User
  • public class User
extends BaseResource
    The Patreon user, which can be both patron and creator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class Description
      static class  User.UserField
      This enum represents the different fields or properties associated with the User resource.

      Returns the user's last name.
      int getLikeCount()
      Returns how many posts this user has liked.
      java.util.List<Member> getMemberships()
      Returns the memberships to the campaigns that this user is a member of.
      SocialConnections getSocialConnections()
      Returns a mapping from user's connected app names to external user id on the respective app.
      java.lang.String getThumbURL()
      Returns the user's profile picture URL, scaled to a square of size 100x100px.
      java.lang.String getURL()
      Returns the URL of this user's creator or patron profile.
      java.lang.String getVanity()
      Deprecated.
      Use Campaign.getVanity() instead.
      boolean isCanSeeNSFW()
      Returns if this user can view NFSW content.
      boolean isEmailVerified()
      Returns if the user has confirmed their email.
      boolean isHidePledges()
      Returns if the user has chosen to keep private which creators they pledge to.

      • getAbout

        public java.lang.String getAbout()
        Returns the user's about text, which appears on their profile. Can be null.

        the user's about text or null.

        Returns:
        true if this user can or null.

      • getVanity

        public java.lang.String getVanity()
        Deprecated.
        Use Campaign.getVanity() instead.
        Returns the public "username" of the user. patreon.com/ goes to this user's creator page. Non-creator users might not have a vanity.
        Returns:
        The public "username" of the user.

      • getMemberships

        public java.util.List<Member> getMemberships()
        Returns the memberships to the campaigns that this user is a member of. This may return null if this User resource was pulled from a Member resource.
        Returns:
        memberships to the campaigns the user is a member of.
